module.name: skrill
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: Skrill, которому доверяют миллионы людей по всему миру, удовлетворяет потребности более 156 000 компаний по всему миру, предоставляя удобный и безопасный способ отправлять и получать деньги почти в 20
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Skrill, которому доверяют миллионы людей по всему миру, удовлетворяет потребности более 156 000 компаний по всему миру, предоставляя удобный и безопасный способ отправлять и получать деньги почти в 200 странах и 40 валютах.
module.additional_description: Бесплатная и быстрая настройкаДоступ к кредитным картам и более 100 локальных платежных решений с 1 простой интеграциейСвязаться с 50+ миллионами владельцев SkrillВысочайшие стандарты безопасности и технологии борьбы с мошенничествомБеспроблемная оплата с мобильного, планшета и компьютера

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date.
module.additional_description: Optimize natural search (SEO) on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo...) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautiful email campaigns and communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With Sendinblue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: dateofdelivery
module.description: 72% of customers are satisfied when they can see expected delivery dates of their purchases; let’s satisfy yours up to 100%!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 72% of customers are satisfied when they can see expected delivery dates of their purchases; let’s satisfy yours up to 100%!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ensure the transparency of your business: give reassurance by keeping your customers informed of your delivery dates.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing on your online shop.

module.name: newsletter
module.description: Генерирует файл
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Генерирует файл .CSV для рассылки

module.name: pscleaner
module.description: Since your business keeps evolving all the time, PrestaShop helps you remove your catalog, orders and customers data in one go
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Since your business keeps evolving all the time, PrestaShop helps you remove your catalog, orders and customers data in one go.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to delete databases in one click: it helps clean your store and its data by allowing you the suppression of all data.

module.name: dashgoals
module.description: Enrich the ‘Dashboard’ section of your back office, add a block with your store’s forecast to always step ahead!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Enrich the ‘Dashboard’ section of your back office, add a block with your store’s forecast to always step ahead!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.name: gridhtml
module.description: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules.

module.name: pagesnotfound
module.description: Enrich the ‘Stats’ section of your back office, display the pages requested by your visitors that could not be found
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Enrich the ‘Stats’ section of your back office, display the pages requested by your visitors that could not be found.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Prevent technical issue: people attempting to access pages of your catalog but could not find them, resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors, can be useful to detect potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.description_full: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website.

module.name: trackingfront
module.description: Your business is wider than just this store, gathering affiliates around? Enable them to access their own statistics so that you can both grow faster, hand in hand
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Your business is wider than just this store, gathering affiliates around? Enable them to access their own statistics so that you can both grow faster, hand in hand.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Increase your visibility: manage your affiliates and traffic to be reachable and improve your SEO.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Save time: turn simple jobs into programmed tasks you won’t have to care about too much.Schedule your needs: and make it automatically done, easy-peasy!Handle all these tasks: have it all listed at the same place to better manage each job and create new ones if needed.

module.name: cartsguru
module.displayName: Carts Guru | Abandoned Cart Solution | Free Trial
module.description: Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution. Use Emails, SMS, Facebook Messenger, Facebook Ads to convert more than 20% of lost customers into sales
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution. Use Emails, SMS, Facebook Messenger, Facebook Ads to convert more than 20% of lost customers into sales.
module.additional_description: Carts Guru will help you to convert your "almost buyers" into paying customers. Multichannel Retargeting: Emails, Facebook Ads, Facebook Messenger and SMS.Convert more than 20% of your abandoned cartsAutomatic suggestions to continuously improve your rules Carts Guru is your all-in-one retargeting solution. Try it for free for 10 days, no credit card needed.  Check our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Connect with your customers and reassure them by highlighting your services: secure payment, free shipping, returns, etc
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Connect with your customers and reassure them by highlighting your services: secure payment, free shipping, returns, etc.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Establish a trust relationship: customizable and responsive information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing in your online shop.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Add a banner to the homepage of your store to highlight your sales and new products in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add a banner to the homepage of your store to highlight your sales and new products in a visual and friendly way.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Address specific customers: you can create a banner for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Promote seasonal offers: it will help your customers to feel like shopping your products.Highlight an important section of your store: your visitors will probably pay attention to and focus more on your catalog.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Help visualize the navigation on your store, show your visitors the current category and subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help visualize the navigation on your store, show your visitors the current category and subcategories.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:​Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop and see available subcategories.Picture the category tree: it is very useful to navigate between category and subcategory pages.Facilitate the search: help your visitors to easily find the items they want. Indeed, they just have to look at the right place, and they will spot it quickly!

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Let your customers know where to reach you, add contact information in the header and footer of your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Let your customers know where to reach you, add contact information in the header and footer of your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Establish a trust relationship: information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.Be available: your customers will love to know when and how they can join you, it is always useful!

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in by enabling this link to appear on your front office
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in by enabling this link to appear on your front office.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to connect with your customers: create an easy purchasing environment for your clients to make them feel like going back.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Provide your visitors with extra information, display a customized block of content on the homepage of your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Provide your visitors with extra information, display a customized block of content on the homepage of your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Build your brand image: adding text to your pages allows you to focus your customers on specific aspects of your brand.Address specific customers: you can create content for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Strengthen your content strategy: provide information and target keywords to reach best search engine results.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Handle your customers: retrieve data on your subscribers in one place with their email address, main information, etc.Create special offers: offer your subscribers a voucher to stimulate their shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_featuredproducts
module.description: Pick the category you want and highlight the items it contains; enhance your customers experience with a lively homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Pick the category you want and highlight the items it contains; enhance your customers experience with a lively homepage.

module.name: ps_mainmenu
module.description: Make it easy for your visitors to find their way on your store, select the right link and turn it into a menu item
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make it easy for your visitors to find their way on your store, select the right link and turn it into a menu item.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:​Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop while keeping an eye on its menu.Increase your visibility: select content and keywords you want to highlight and focus on your SEO.

module.name: ps_sharebuttons
module.description: Facebook, Twitter, Google, etc. gather your community around your catalog by displaying social media sharing buttons on every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Facebook, Twitter, Google, etc. gather your community around your catalog by displaying social media sharing buttons on every product page.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Increase your digital strategy: let your customers know where to reach you and make them feel like sharing your content.Gain visibility on your social media: select on what channels you want to focus attention on and target your content according to this.

module.name: ps_socialfollow
module.description: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, etc, let your customers know where to follow you and increase your community
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, etc, let your customers know where to follow you and increase your community.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Gather your community: keep an eye on your customers to reach them more easily and connect with them all, in various ways.Address specific customers: you can create specific contents depending on the channels used, thus targeting people based on the social network they’re signed in on.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept wire payments by displaying your account details during the checkout and make it easy for your customers to purchase on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Facilitate shopping: create a flexible purchasing environment for your clients to make them feel like going back.Allow anyone to buy your products: accepting bank wire help people to purchase your items with the payment method of their choice.

module.name: ps_linklist

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give more visibility to your content/static pages (CMS, external pages, etc.), where you want and when you want, to make your visitors feel like shopping on your store.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Go where you want and offer your business its own advertising space, led by your own rules.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Add advertisements on your shop: explore new shopping possibilities by placing an ad right on your front office.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items.

module.name: ps_bestsellers
module.description: Because your business is always evolving, show your visitors what are your top-selling products directly on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Because your business is always evolving, show your visitors what are your top-selling products directly on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Create a showcase: display your store’s best selling items directly on your front office and boost your sales.Create a separate page in addition to the block: your visitors will have a clear idea of your most purchased products.

module.name: ps_categoryproducts
module.description: Enhance your business, add a block on every product page that displays items from the same category
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Enhance your business, add a block on every product page that displays items from the same category.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you offer your customers matching products, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items.

module.name: ps_productinfo
module.description: Create lively product pages with an animated tooltip block on each product page of your store that displays information about your sales
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Create lively product pages with an animated tooltip block on each product page of your store that displays information about your sales.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Get data in one glance: your visitors just have to land on a product page to have a quick look at the last sales regarding this product.Analyze your traffic: know where your visitors stop and what how many items have been purchased.

module.name: ps_cashondelivery
module.description: Accept payments on delivery, by cash, to make it easy for your customers to purchase on your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept payments on delivery, by cash, to make it easy for your customers to purchase on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Facilitate shopping: create a flexible purchasing environment for your clients, allow to make them feel like going back.Allow anyone to buy your products: accepting cash on delivery help customers without a credit card to purchase your items.

module.name: ps_rssfeed
module.description: Display the RSS feed of your choice on your shop and keep your pages dynamic; an active store is a store that retains attention!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display the RSS feed of your choice on your shop and keep your pages dynamic; an active store is a store that retains attention!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Catch your customers’ attention: you can let them have a glance at the RSS feed of your choice.Increase traffic: get traffic, other websites will be able to display your new products on their page.Promote your pages: display a link to your latest blog posts directly in your shop - or to any other content you deem suitable!

module.name: ps_brandlist
module.description: Highlight the brands whose items can be purchased on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by brand
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Highlight the brands whose items can be purchased on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by brand.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display in one-click all the brands available and optimize the user experience.Increase your visibility: highlight the brands you sell on your shop and focus on your SEO to gain traffic.

module.name: ps_supplierlist
module.description: Highlight the suppliers available to complete purchases on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by supplier
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Highlight the suppliers available to complete purchases on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by supplier.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display in one-click all the suppliers available and optimize the user experience.Increase your visibility: highlight your suppliers on your shop and focus on your SEO to gain traffic.

module.name: ps_viewedproduct
module.description: Give inspiration to your visitors, display a kind of showcase on your product pages with the recently viewed products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give inspiration to your visitors, display a kind of showcase on your product pages with the recently viewed products.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you recall to your visitors what items they last viewed, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display recently viewed products via this immediate, one-click access and optimize the user experience.

module.name: ps_crossselling
module.description: Foster your activity, offer your customers the possibility to buy matching items when on a product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Foster your activity, offer your customers the possibility to buy matching items when on a product page.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you offer your customers matching products, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: because your products need special attention, display related products via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items.

module.name: ps_dataprivacy
module.description: Reassure your customers about the use of their data, display a short notice in the customer form to let them know that you care about privacy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Reassure your customers about the use of their data, display a short notice in the customer form to let them know that you care about privacy.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ensure the transparency of your business: give reassurance by displaying a small block in the customer account creation form.Reinforce trust: tell your customers what you do (and don’t) with their private data - you can trust us, it will be much appreciated!Boost your sales: a client who feels confident will be more likely to come back shopping in your store.Address specific customers: you can create specific contents depending on the language.

module.name: ps_feeder
module.description: Stay close to your visitors, add an RSS link inside your pages so that they can subscribe to this feed and get regular updates about your catalog
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Stay close to your visitors, add an RSS link inside your pages so that they can subscribe to this feed and get regular updates about your catalog.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: send regular updates to loyal customers by adding this feed to their own feed reader, without the need to subscribe to your newsletter.Improve your SEO: search engines may use it to discover your new content.Increase your visibility: get traffic, other websites will be able to display your new products on their page.

module.name: ps_reminder
module.description: Offer your customers a quick follow-up to bring them back on your store, create daily customized e-mails to send and keep in touch easily
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Offer your customers a quick follow-up to bring them back on your store, create daily customized e-mails to send and keep in touch easily.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: recapture lost sales with reminders on canceled carts.Reward your customers: send vouchers when they reach a given amount of orders, validate their first order or to make them come back on your store!

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach® Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important „PrestaShop data“ will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach® newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble.  At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export. Synchronized PrestaShop data:  Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details … purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amount product details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material … It’s as simple as that! Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit.  Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort.  Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email.  CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 190,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account.

module.name: ps_googleanalytics
module.description: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Analyze your visitors' behavior: be able to retrace all the stops your customers take on the road to action on your store.Gain new customers: read this data as a measurable way to improve your campaigns and reach new audiences.

module.name: pspixel
module.description: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop! With the Pixel, create and export your product c
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop! With the Pixel, create and export your product catalog in the Facebook Business Manager platform to manage your campaign and sell products through your Facebook Page or Instagram feed.
module.additional_description: Use the Facebook pixel with your Prestashop website to:   -          Measure the results of your ads: Understand sales that resulted from your Facebook campaigns using Facebook ads reporting. -          Reach the right people: Find new customers and optimize your ads for people who are more likely to make a purchase by creating custom audiences. -          Show the right products: Automatically create ads that showcase your products, or use dynamic ads to retarget your site visitors with relevant ads based on what they browsed on your website -           Export your catalog on the Facebook Business Manager platform with data about each product

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 в 1: Упростите обновление систем безопасности и функциональные обновления всех модулей вашего магазина и получайте каждую неделю советы по интернет-торговле
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 в 1: Упростите обновление систем безопасности и функциональные обновления всех модулей вашего магазина и получайте каждую неделю советы по интернет-торговле.
module.additional_description: Войдите в свой аккаунт на PrestaShop Addons с этим модулем и вы сможете:Получать каждую неделю полезный совет по интернет-торговле, открывающийся по ссылке вместе с соответствующим календарем, и который вы найдете непосредственно на своей панели управления (например, когда и как готовиться к Черной пятнице, к акциям начала осени и т.п.);  Защитить свой магазин, будучи отныне в курсе последних обновлений систем безопасности модулей, которые вы скачали на PrestaShop Addons;  Пользоваться новыми функциями, добавленными к модулям, которые вы скачали на PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: cobiro
module.displayName: Automated Google Marketing - Get More Sales With Cobiro
module.description: Start advertising on Google Ads today - free & 100% automated. Cobiro is artificial intelligence for Search & Shopping ads that can be set up in minutes. Signup today and get $100 of free ads
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Start advertising on Google Ads today - free & 100% automated. Cobiro is artificial intelligence for Search & Shopping ads that can be set up in minutes. Signup today and get $100 of free ads. Save up to 25% on your Google Shopping campaigns!
module.additional_description: Turn your products and categories into high quality ads Connect your PrestaShop store to Cobiro, and let us set up automated advertisement on the Google Advertisement Network from your product catalogue. Google AdWords is Google's advertising system where advertisers bid on keywords in order for their clickable ads to appear in Google's search results. Cobiro automates the creation, maintenance and bid management of ads, so you can focus on running your business instead.  No matter whether you’re selling products or trying to bring awareness to your services, Cobiro’s got you covered.

module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads on Google (Google Shopping + Dynamic Remarketing)
module.description: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network.If your account is suitable, we will apply a $75 coupon for your first campaigns!
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Google Shopping campaigns: We create, manage and optimize your Google Shopping campaigns.Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Google Ads app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right costumers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: psgdpr
module.displayName: Соответствие Общему регламенту ЕС по защите персональных данных (GDPR) by PrestaShop (1.7)
module.description: Общий регламент по защите персональных данных (RGPD) вступает в силу 25 мая 2018 года
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Общий регламент по защите персональных данных (RGPD) вступает в силу 25 мая 2018 года. Обеспечьте соответствие своего магазина требованиям этого европейского регламента!   Команда PrestaShop при поддержке экспертов по RGPD разработала официальный модуль RGPD — уникальный модуль, дающий вам всеобъемлющее и адаптированное к вашему сайту решение для обработки персональных данных, собираемых с помощью PrestaShop и установленных в вашем магазине модулей.*   * См. подробнее “Характеристики”. Note: This module is only compatible with PrestaShop 1.7, please click here to find the version for PrestaShop 1.5 & 1.6.
module.additional_description: Что такое RGPD?   Новый европейский регламент RGPD устанавливает правовые основы обработки персональных данных пользователей. Он распространяется на любую обработку персональных данных (сбор, хранение, извлечение, использование, удаление и т. д.), автоматизированную и нет.   Персональные данные — это информация, позволяющая прямо или косвенно идентифицировать физическое лицо (имя и фамилия, почтовый адрес, IP адрес, номер телефона и т. д.).   Почему именно наш модуль RGPD?   Официальный модуль PrestaShop поможет вам обеспечить соответствие своего магазина требованиям RGPD. Модуль позволяет выполнить основные требования этого европейского регламента в отношении персональных данных ваших покупателей:  Право на доступ к персональным данным и их переносПраво на исправление и/или удаление персональных данныхПраво на отзыв согласия на обработку  Этот модуль также позволит вам вести журнал всех действий ваших покупателей в отношении их персональных данных (доступ, согласие, удаление и т. д.). Таким образом, вы сможете продемонстрировать выполнение требований регламента.

module.name: touchize
module.description: Swipe-2-Buy makes mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable giving increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 3 months free trial
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Swipe-2-Buy makes mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable giving increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 3 months free trial.
module.additional_description: A unique mobile shopping experience for your customersBy optimizing mobile sales with Swipe-2-Buy for smartphones and tablets, Touchize Commerce gives your customers a unique mobile shopping experienceLowers the barrier between inspiration and purchaseSwipe-2-Buy increases customer satisfaction and loyalty to your shop A unique tool to grow your online mobile salesConsumers gets a faster, simpler and more enjoyable shopping experience.Makes it simpler for the mobile consumers to put more products in the shopping cart (Increased Average Order Value /AOV)You can quickly add interactive promotional banners where consumers can drag products from the banners directly to the cart 3-months free trial periodSign-up for a 3 months free trial and see all Touchize Swipe-2-Buy have to offerNo credit card requiredPricing info: https://touchize.com/subscription/prestashop

module.name: ps_mbo
module.displayName: PrestaShop Marketplace in your Back Office
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: billriantpay
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: Increase sales by offering to your customers the card payment with BillriantPay. One of the most secure, reliable, simple and convenient payment methods to make payments online
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase sales by offering to your customers the card payment with BillriantPay. One of the most secure, reliable, simple and convenient payment methods to make payments online.
module.additional_description: If you are looking for a ONE-STOP PAYMENT SOLUTION then this is the module for you. FAST settlement: Get paid to your nominated account in as little as 1 business day. EASY setup: Start transacting sooner with BillriantPay in just a few clicks. HELPFUL: Access 24/7 phone, email, and live chat support. HUMAN: Our local team of payment experts work around the clock. Advanced Fraud Prevention: Get real-time fraud monitoring on all your transactions. Detailed Reporting: Plan your next move with access to transaction reports in our BillriantPay Dashboard. Developer friendly: Our BillriantPay API and Developer friendly tools let you fully customise the checkout experience to convert more sales. Reduce PCI Compliance: We help to secure your payments and reduce PCI compliance scope with our innovative payment technologies.

module.name: ps_faviconnotificationbo
module.displayName: Favicon Notifications in the Back Office
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: bridge_connector
module.displayName: Spaceboost - The Best Google Ads Automation
module.description: Increase sales for your store by advertising your products on Google Ads Search and Shopping with quick, effective, and easy-to-use AI technology
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Increase sales for your store by advertising your products on Google Ads Search and Shopping with quick, effective, and easy-to-use AI technology. In three steps, get advertising online and grow your business without spending more than you want.
module.additional_description: Use a custom version of the world’s leading PPC management partner to find the perfect audience for your products! And, if you create or link a new Google Ads account, Google and Spaceboost will reimburse up to €120 of your ad investment! Get in touch to see if your account is applicable.
